# dcos-miniod

## Configuration

```
base64 my-custom-minio-properties.json.mustache
ewoJInZlcnNpb24iOiAiMjciLAoJImNyZWRlbnRpYWwiOiB7CgkJImFjY2Vzc0tleSI6ICJtaW5pbyIsC...
```

Create an options.json:

```
{
  "minio": {
    "CONFIG_MUSTACHE_BASE64": ""
  }
}
```

Install:

```
dcos package install miniod --options=options.json
```
